metadata.name: Powershell Create Scheduled Task
metadata.comment: Adversaries may abuse the Windows Task Scheduler to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-scheduledtaskaction')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-scheduledtasktrigger')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-scheduledtaskprincipal')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-scheduledtasksettingsset')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-scheduledtask')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('register-scheduledtask')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-cimmethod')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-classname')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ps_scheduledtask')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-namespace')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('root\\microsoft\\windows\\taskscheduler')))

output.summary: Adversaries may abuse the Windows Task Scheduler to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code
